name: VCCorp
description: VC Corp (established in 2006) is the leading technology company in Vietnam in developing technology and internet product. The main business models include: e-commerce, online content, online advertising and mobile content. VC Corp is collaborating and holding system of 80 websites with 30 million unique visitors ? about 90% of Vietnam Internet users. The current products of VC Corp have created the largest ecosystem and platform of online and mobile services in Vietnam.
